channel.title: Need help with ::pickup
channel.description: Could someone please help me with adding the ::pickup command to my server? I'm using Bl00d-Blitz as a source and always get errors when trying to add the command -.- thanks in advance :)

item.title: Need help with ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

rip4d:

Thanks, although it only lets me pickup items with an ID of 10k+

Are you sure your making the codes all 5 digits? So if you wanted to pickup a tool kit your code should be.
::pickup 00001 1
NOT
::pickup 1 1

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Thanks, although it only lets me pickup items with an ID of 10k+

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::pickup
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("Failed to pick up "+newItemAmount+" of "+newItemID+".");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Critical failure at picking up "+newItemAmount+" of "+newItemID+".");
        }
    }[/code]

Just make sure you’re getting what you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with ::pickup

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Thanks but whenever i try to pickup an item, it comes up with the error message I put it under the starter command tho.

item.title: Need help with ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Add this under the starter commands [code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic
